title: TimestampConverter Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for TimestampConverter transformation. Converts timestamps between different formats.

type.description: The transformation type. Use 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.TimestampConverter$Key' for key transformation or 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.TimestampConverter$Value' for value transformation.
type.title: type

field.description: The field name containing the timestamp to convert. If not specified, converts the record timestamp.
field.title: field

format.description: SimpleDateFormat pattern for parsing string timestamps. Required when source is a string.
format.title: format

defaultSnippets.label: TimestampConverter - Convert record timestamp to Unix
defaultSnippets.description: Convert the record timestamp to Unix epoch time (milliseconds since 1970-01-01). No field specified means it converts the record timestamp itself.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**TimestampConverter** - Convert the record timestamp to Unix epoch time.

No field specified means it converts the record timestamp itself (Kafka's internal timestamp).

**Target types:** `unix` (epoch milliseconds), `Date` (date only), `Time` (time only), `Timestamp` (date + time)

**Use case:** Standardize timestamp formats for downstream systems that expect Unix timestamps.

defaultSnippets.label: TimestampConverter - Convert field to Date
defaultSnippets.description: Convert a timestamp field to Date type. Replace 'timestamp' with your actual field name. Target types: unix, Date, Time, Timestamp.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**TimestampConverter** - Convert a timestamp field to Date type.

Replace `timestamp` with your actual field name.

**Target types:**
- `unix` - Unix epoch milliseconds
- `Date` - Date only (no time)
- `Time` - Time only (no date)
- `Timestamp` - Full date and time

**Use case:** Extract just the date portion from a timestamp field for date-based partitioning or filtering.

defaultSnippets.label: TimestampConverter - Convert string field with format
defaultSnippets.description: Convert a string field containing a timestamp to Timestamp type. Format is required when source is a string. Replace field name and format pattern as needed.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**TimestampConverter** - Convert a string field containing a timestamp to Timestamp type.

Format is required when source is a string. Use SimpleDateFormat patterns (e.g., `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss`). Replace field name and format pattern as needed.

**Common formats:**
- `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss` - Standard datetime
- `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'` - ISO 8601
- `MM/dd/yyyy` - US date format

**Use case:** Parse string timestamps from external systems into proper timestamp types for processing.
